1.name: L'Inferno
1.description: Loosely adapted from Dante's Divine Comedy and inspired by the illustrations of Gustav Doré the original silent film has been restored and has a new score by Tangerine Dream.

4.name: Oborona Sevastopolya

5.name: Anna Karenina
5.description: Countess Anna Karenina is torn between her lover Vronsky, and her husband, Count Karenin. Anna's love to Vronsky causes her much pain and social pressure. Her passion to Vronsky drives Anna...                See full summary »

8.description: This is the oldest found dramatic film from Serbia made in 1911. "Karadjordje" is a biography of a famed leader of a rebellion against the Turkish empire in 1804. We can see his whole life ...                See full summary »

9.description: (Reel 1) Beamish McCoul joined the Irish insurrection and had become a leader in the movement when he was arrested and placed in Wicklow Jail. His property was confiscated by the ...                See full summary »

12.name: Dzieje grzechu
12.description: The teenage girl is first seen confessing and warned about having any impure thoughts or feelings. Her family has boarders and one day a young man moves in and they fall in love.

14.name: Hamlet
14.description: Hamlet suspects his uncle has murdered his father to claim the throne of Denmark and the hand of Hamlet's mother, but the prince cannot decide whether or not he should take vengeance.

15.name: The Padre
15.description: It is the early days of California. Father Sebastian, trudging his way on foot from the Mission, his attention is attracted to the wall of an infant coming from the crest of a ridge. He ...                See full summary »

17.name: Mormonens offer
17.description: A Mormon missionary seduces and kidnaps an attractive young woman, forcing her to accompany him to Utah to become one of his wives.

18.name: As in a Looking Glass
18.description: A father's drinking leads him to neglect his family. His young son emulates his father's actions when playing with his friends. The father sees his vices reflected in the child's play and resolves to change his ways.

20.name: Însir'te margarite
20.description: Composed of scenes meant to be projected in the intermissions of a play displayed at the National Theatre of Bucharest.

22.name: Der fremde Vogel
22.description: Vacationing in Germany, May falls for boatman Max. Her father disapproves and during a night of romance between the young couple Max drowns.

24.name: It Is Never Too Late to Mend

26.name: Captain Starlight, or Gentleman of the Road

31.name: Die Verräterin
31.description: A woman betrays the regiment location in which the officer she is interested in is assigned because he despises her, only to regret it when he is caught and try to free him.

47.name: L'électrocuté
47.description: The body of a cook is brought to life by an electrician through the use of electrodes.
